>>> THE U.S. PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES HILLARY CLINTON AND

OUR FIRST RESPONDERS. CLINTON ALSO SAYING WE NEED TO
PRAY FOR THE VICTIMS IN THIS CASE, SECURITY IS LIKELY TO
